action.action-desc: Mr. Paulsen (for himself, Mr. Thompson of California, Mr. Nunes, and Mr. Smith of Missouri) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the limitation on the carryover of excess corporate charitable contributions.

section.header: Extension of limitation on carryover of excess corporate charitable contributions

subsection.text: Section 170(d)(2)(A) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking 5 succeeding taxable years and inserting 20 succeeding taxable years, and
by striking the second, third, fourth, or fifth and inserting each of the second through twentieth.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to contributions made in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2009.
